title: Qantas logo 1968 - 1984
content:
Very short question. I'm wondering if anyone knows what font was used by Qantas on the 1968 - 1984 logo?

[http://www.dinesh.com/images/stories/logo/airline-logos/qantas\_Logo\_3\_1968\_1984.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011929/http:/www.dinesh.com/images/stories/logo/airline-logos/qantas_Logo_3_1968_1984.png)
author: _someone

comments.content:
Hi Beau,

probably not a font but a custom drawn logo. The ‘S’ reminds me of Serpentine.  
F

Darn, I was hoping that wasn't the case. Hmm, that 'S' is very close, might be able to get away with using a couple of characters from other fonts. Guess I'll keep tracing it in inkscape then. Thanks.
